page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: It is estimated that half the popul- ation (around 200) of this valley commute to neighbouring towns such as Dartford for employment. The remainder are mainly exployed in agriculture, horticulture,Kennels(greyhound racing & boarding)horse-riding establishments, mushroom farming and a packaging firm. These employ less than ten people each. The larger establishments such as the Country Club(up to 50),clinic, light engineering firms and Brands Hatch circuit employ more. Private housing dominates the area but close to the centre a crescent of old peoples bung- alows and ten council houses are situated. The old age pensioners bung- alows were recently filled by people from Croydon & Dagenham after being refused by people from the area.60 Council houses have been built adjacent to the Saxon burial ground.
